name: Da Man Sean
description:
Your name is Sean...wait Shawn,.. uh Shon?  You don't know!  And that's why you are mad...and why you have come to the Die Mansion.  Blast your way through the Die Men and defeat Sheen to find out how to spell your name!

Move with WASD
Jump with Space
Shoot with Left Mouse Click
Activate Rage with R

Nick: Programming, Art, Sound Effects, Puns
Marty: Programming
Damien: Programming
Vince: Music, Art, Sound Effects
Griffin: Music
Zach: Art, Level Design

Made during the VTGP Fall 2020 Game Jam
